common.loading_subtitle: Please wait while we fetch amazing workout options

hero.p1: It's your mind that needs convincing. Push past your limits, stay committed,
hero.p2: and watch as your body transform into powerhouse of strength and resilience.
hero.p3: Start your journey today & truly capable of!

why.desc: We offer a fitness journey that's tailored to your goals, supported by professional trainers and a welcoming community. Whether it's weight loss, strength building, or overall wellness, our proven methods.
why.f1_desc: We tailor every workout to fit your unique goals and fitness level ensuring that you make the most progress.
why.f2_desc: Everything we do is designed to help you achieve measurable results, whether you're aiming for weight loss.
why.f3_desc: We provide the latest in gym equipment, from cardio machines to free weights, designed to support every type.

about.desc: We believe fitness is more than just a workout—it's a lifestyle. With top-of-the-line facilities, certified trainers, and a supportive community, we're here to inspire and guide you every step of the way.
about.f1_desc: Achieve your fitness goals with the guidance of our certified trainers.
about.f2_desc: From steady-state runs to interval sprints, our treadmill programs.
about.f3_desc: Our gym is equipped with the latest cardio & strength machines.
about.f4_desc: Fuel your fitness journey with customized meal plans for you.
